content: I'm in Urbana Champlain at the UofI. @DerekD and I dabble in Lean regularly. Not sure if there are others here that are working with mathlib. Would love to meet up!
I am moving there in July! My wife is starting as a new assistant professor at U of I
Hi Brandon. That's great. I'm thrilled to have another Lean user in our small community. Feel free to reach out should you or your wife need anything when you reach Urbana Champaign.
I'm officially setup here in Champaign - are you and whomever else meeting regularly?

Brandon Brown said:

I'm officially setup here in Champaign - are you and whomever else meeting regularly?

I'm moving into the area this weekend. Let me know if you guys worked anything out.
Nothing is worked out but I’m around

Brandon Brown said:

Nothing is worked out but I’m around

Ok, cool. I'm starting the big drive later today; I'll reach out and see if we can put something together when I get in town.
For anyone interested, Brandon and I had (and survived) the first local Lean hang-out, so the ice at UIUC has officially been broken.

For people affiliated with University of Illinois:
Grigore Rosu is teaching CS 522 Programming Language Semantics this semester, using Lean.
He seems to have changed his mind and is going back to Maude, which is what he usually uses to teach it sigh
